title: Java İçerikleri Hakkında
content: Uzun süredir Firefox'ta Java içerikleri çalışmıyor, bilgisayarımda Java da kurulu ama yine sayfalar hata veriyor, yapmam gereken nedir.. Blgisi olan varsa lütfen yardımcı olabilir mi? Ben bir cevap bekliyorum, teşekkürler
creator: shkmn

title: Calendar on page.
content: I am trying to use firefox to replace Google and their stupid ads. I got google calendar to auto load with firefox but not all my calendar activities. Can you please tell me how to get it to work properly. Thanks.'
creator: kelyns123

title: Hard Drive failure on Windows 10 pc
content:
hard drive failed on windows 10 pc, new drive put in & window 10 reinstalled with Edge browser (by experts) What do i do to get firefox browser as my main browser back with all my bookmarks etc & firefox VPN ?

Do I just download firefox installer & sign on & all bookmarks etc will be there?

Thank you for your help, Tony
creator: bositlmusl
